name: Wheat Price Rise Due to War
description: A scenario simulating the impact of a geopolitical conflict that disrupts the global wheat supply, causing price hikes and shifting demand towards products with more resilient supply chains.

initial.description: A stable market with typical commodity price fluctuations and underlying geopolitical tensions.

timed_events.name: Geopolitical Conflict Erupts
timed_events.description: A war in a major wheat-exporting region creates immediate supply chain uncertainty and market jitters.

effects.message: Market uncertainty is forcing us to tie up more cash in securing raw material inventory.

timed_events.name: Wheat Prices Skyrocket
timed_events.description: The conflict has severely disrupted wheat exports, causing a massive spike in the price of flour and other core ingredients.

effects.message: The soaring cost of wheat has drastically reduced our profit margins.
Significantly higher raw material costs are straining our cash reserves.

timed_events.name: Market Seeks Alternatives
timed_events.description: With persistently high wheat prices, clients and consumers begin favoring products made with innovative, non-wheat-based, and more cost-stable ingredients.

effects.message: Our innovative use of alternative ingredients is a key advantage, attracting customers seeking price stability!
